channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [OGNL-39] Ternary expression with date formatting causes Mismatched stack types error
item.description:
Fail-safe catches this one and the page renders fine.

.html:

<span jwcid="@Insert" value="ognl:testDate == null ? '-' : @collective.md.ui.pages.DirectorAccount@DATETIME_FORMAT.format(testDate)" />

.java:

public static final SimpleDateFormat DATETIME_FORMAT = new SimpleDateFormat("MM/dd/yyyy hh:mm a 'CST'");

public Date getTestDate()

{ return new Date(); }

The stack rendered to the console is as follows:

java.lang.VerifyError: (class: ognl/ASTTest587958Accessor, method: get signature: (Lognl/OgnlContext;Ljava/lang/Object;)Ljava/lang/Object Mismatched stack types

item.environment: OGNL snapshot from 4-7, Tapestry snapshot from 4-8, WinXP, Firefox 2
item.summary: Ternary expression with date formatting causes Mismatched stack types error

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
